Abaddon.effect: Buff increases with each attack, synergizes with Chaos units
Abaddon.best_with: Kharn (best Chaos synergy), Dante, Trajan for raid meta teams

Eldryon.effect: +898 damage to all units, +1197 to Aeldari within 2 hexes per hit
Eldryon.positioning: Must be exactly 2 hexes away from target
Eldryon.notes: Was nerfed but still meta for raids

Bellator.effect: Summons buff multi-hit teams, 6 melee hits
Bellator.best_with: Multi-hit raid teams with Ragnar and Kharn
Bellator.notes: In meta teams, loses to Calgar in pure damage

Kharn.effect: High multi-hit damage dealer, synergizes with AoE buffers
Kharn.best_with: Abaddon (Chaos boost), Eldryon (damage per hit), Calgar (damage stat buff)

Thaddeus.effect: Suppress against overwatch heroes, buffs heavy weapons
Thaddeus.notes: Lacks broad faction synergy, very niche

Maugan Ra.effect: 6-hit ranged attacks, scales massively with Eldryon buff

Anuphet.effect: Summons Necron Warriors, synergizes with Relentless March

Makhotep.effect: Core Necron synergy with Fabricator Claws

Aleph-Null.effect: Heals mechanical units, 5+ hits with buffs, pairs with Re'vas
Aleph-Null.best_with: Re'vas (legendary events), Actus (6 hits in arena), AdMech teams
Aleph-Null.notes: Super good in legendary events mechanical track

Re'vas.effect: Most usable in guild raids, arenas, LREs

Aun'shi.effect: Allows used active abilities to trigger again, buffs Tau allies per round
Aun'shi.passive_buffs: Round 1: -25% damage reduction, Round 2: extra movement, Round 3: damage boost
Aun'shi.notes: OP ability reactivation, meta for Tau

Shadowsun.effect: Applies markerlight (+15% ranged damage to all Tau)
Shadowsun.notes: Markerlights now work on bosses (July 2023 buff)

Darkstrider.best_with: Tau teams for multiplicative damage stacking
Darkstrider.notes: Markerlights are multiplicative with other buffs (elevation, etc)

Magnus.effect: Strongest psychic caster, buffs Thousand Sons
Magnus.best_with: Typhus (sets up 3+ units for psychic damage bonus)
Magnus.notes: Thousand Sons do max damage after taking psychic hits

Typhus.effect: Sets up psychic damage for Thousand Sons max damage

Dante.effect: Buffs Blood Angels and multi-hit teams, same damage as Eldryon passive at same level
Dante.notes: Released as Eldryon alternative, works with Imperials

Ragnar.effect: 7 melee hits, benefits from all damage buffs
Ragnar.best_with: Calgar (+1300 dmg) + Eldryon (+900 per hit) = +2200 per hit x7
Ragnar.notes: War Howl + Calgar + Eldryon = insane damage

Trajan.effect: Like old Eldryon but for all damage types, creates new multi-hit meta
Trajan.best_with: Multi-hit raid teams, can work with mech teams
Trajan.notes: Likely to dominate multi-hit guild raids, +300k damage for Screamer

Calgar.effect: +300 damage (level 37), +400 for Imperials, buffs adjacent allies
Calgar.best_with: Ragnar (7 hits x damage buff), Isabella (improves healing)
Calgar.notes: At level 50 D3: +1300 damage for Imperials, stacks with other buffs

Yarrick.effect: Summons 4-5 guardsmen, passive buffs battle fatigue units
Yarrick.notes: Nerfed from instant summon to delayed, still strong with Creed

Creed.effect: Summons 2-3 guardsmen, reactivates all guardsmen in range 2/3
Creed.notes: Nerfed indirectly by Yarrick changes, needs setup time

Celestine.effect: Resurrects on death, heals Geminae, 4+ invuln aura
Celestine.notes: Hard to kill, resurrects at end of phase

Isabella.effect: Heals 1197 HP per hit taken (max), revives Imperials
Isabella.best_with: Bellator (6 hits = 7200 HP healed), tank teams
Isabella.notes: Best healer in game by far, enables LRE pushing

Actus.effect: Reactivates mechanical units for second attack
Actus.best_with: Rho (core AdMech), Aleph-Null (6 hits in arena)

Rho.effect: Attacks target when any mech unit attacks enemy next to Rho
Rho.notes: Core of AdMech team, huge damage multiplier

Tan'gida.notes: Crucial for AdMech but can substitute Sho'syl or Anuphet

Ghazghkull.effect: Massive tank, buffs Orks with AoE

Roboute Guilliman.effect: Reroll 1s to hit for Imperium within 12", reroll hits for Ultramarines within 6", reroll wounds of 1
